title: Spiral: Suiri no Kizuna (Dub)
alternative_title: Spiral: Bond of Reasoning, スパイラル -推理の絆-
description: Ayumu Narumi's older brother Kiyotaka, a renowned detective and piano player, disappears all of a sudden. The only clue Narumi has, are the Blade Children. Two years later a row of murders and incidents begin, relating to the Blade Children. Together with school journalist, Hiyono Yuizaki, Narumi tries to figure out their destiny.
